name: Ultrix (Markt & Technik)
overview: One of two games on the C64 called Ultrix. Both of which are shooters. This one was developed by Kopido Games and published by Markt & Technik in 64'er 1992/06. Your girlfriend is kidnapped by an alien ball. You must free her from the alien's clutches. Three levels of difficulty exist, which can be chosen by selecting your Dream Girl.
